segments.text: I notice the little boy's determination, and it’s both admirable and frightening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks hopeful, as if she believes in the magic of cookie-sharing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how this little act of rebellion carries so much weight in this otherwise mundane setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s feet are standing right in the water, a hazard she doesn’t see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That tipping stool feels like a disaster waiting to happen, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily a simple cookie can bring such joy but also lead to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I watch, half wanting to intervene and half wanting to see what happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
